summary: ON UPHILL 1 OR 2% GRADE, THE TRANSMISSION SHIFT AND HOLD ONTO LOWER GEAR WHEN CLIMBING UPHILL THEN WILL NOT UP SHIFT WHEN GAS PEDAL IS RELEASED.  TRANSMISSION CAN'T DECIDE WHAT GEAR TO GO TO OR STAY IN..  CONSUMING UN NECESSARY FUEL AND POSSIBLE SPUN.  AND ALSO AUTOMATICALLY ENGAGE ENGINE BRAKE WHEN TRAVELING STIFF DOWN HILL.
